verses.text: Ix yalanxi winhaj Eliú chi' icha tik:
Ha ticnaik ak' niwank'olal, yujto ol ach in k'ayb'ej, ayto tas ol wal yuj swach'iloc Dios.
Ol wak'lab'ej jantac in jelanil yic tzin ch'oxaneli to ha Dios chi' b'ojinac onh, tojol ton paxi.
Ojtaquejeli to a tas swal tik t'ayach manh esoc. Ha in tzin lolon ed' tik, tz'akan in jelanil.
Ha Dios te ay spoder, te ay pax sjelanil, palta malaj junok mach spatiquejeli.
Ha heb' chuk sk'ulej, scham heb' yuj Dios chi', haxo heb' tz'ixtaji, sb'oji yaj heb' yuj.
Ha stanhwan heb' anima wach' sb'eyb'al. Ha tz'ak'anoch heb' yajalil yic sb'inaj heb' t'a masanil tiempo.
Axo heb' sk'ulan chukal, tato stzek'chaj heb' t'a k'een cadena, syab' wal syail heb'.
Ha Dios sch'oxani b'ajtac tz'och smul heb' chi' yujto tzek' heb' t'a yib'anh.
Sloloni yic skachan heb', syalani to syactejkan schukal heb' chi'.
Tato scha yab' heb', syak'anoch sb'a heb' t'a yol sk'ab', tzalajk'olal tzek' heb', ato syal jantac sk'inal heb' syak'a'.
Palta tato max scha yab' heb' jun, xicjicham heb', sb'atkan heb' t'a skal heb' chamnac yujto maj yak'och heb' t'a sk'ool tas syal Dios.
Ha heb' malaj yelk'och Dios t'ay, aynhejcot yowal heb'. Wach'chom tz'ak'jioch syaelal heb' yuj, palta max yal-laj sb'a heb' t'ay yic sk'anan scolwal heb' t'a yib'anh.
Spet cham heb', q'uixwelal tz'aj satel heb'.
Ha t'a skal syaelal junok mach, ha Dios tz'ak'an nachajel smul, yic scolchaj t'a skal syaelal chi'.

Mamin Job, icha chi' snib'ej Dios tzach yutej. Tzach yik'anelta t'a skal a yaelal, tzach yik'anb'at t'a jun lugar te wach' b'aj manhxa tas syak' palta t'ayach, yic tzak' tzalajb'oc a k'ool t'a wael jantac swach'il.
Palta haxo ticnaik, ha Dios tzach ch'olb'itani, a yaelal smoj schaan heb' chuk, a chi' wan a chaani.
Yuj chi' ya'ilej a b'a yic wach' manh elanhchameloc tzach satel yuj yowal sk'ol Dios. Manh ol yal a colchaj t'a yowal sk'ol chi' yuj jantacoc tumin.
Malaj yelk'och a b'eyumal t'a sat. Malaj pax yelk'och jantac ipalil t'ay.
Mokab' a nib'ejcot sq'uik'alq'uinalil chamel t'a ib'anh, aton stiempoal satjiel niwac chonhab' t'a elanhchamel.
Ya'ilej a b'a yic max a nib'ejb'at a b'ha t'a chukal, yujto a yaelal tik ix jawi t'a ib'anh yic max ach b'at t'a chukal chi'.
Scham wal ilan jantac spoder Dios. Malaj junok k'ayb'um syal slajb'an sb'a yet'oc.
Malaj junok mach syal yalan tas sk'ulej, malaj mach syal yalanoch t'a sat to chuk ix sk'ulej.
Masanil anima tz'alan wach' lolonel yuj tas wach' ix sb'o Dios chi'. Ya'ilej pax a b'a yic max b'at satk'olal alan wach' lolonel t'ay.
Masanil anima tz'ilan tastac b'ob'il yuj, wach'chom najatnhej syilb'at heb'.
Maxtzac nachajel cuuj jantac sniwanil yelk'ochi, max yal ko b'isan jantac yab'ilal.
Ha tz'ik'ank'e jantac ha ha' t'a chaanh, smeltzajoch ha' nhab'il.
Smolan sb'ha ha' t'a skal asun, slajwi chi' yax nhab' tz'aj yem ha' t'a quib'anh.
Malaj mach snachajel yuj tas tz'aj spukaxb'at asun chi' yuj, ma tas yuj sk'anh k'u t'a satcha’anh b'aj ay skajnub'.
Ha tz'ak'anek' copoljoc lheb'lon t'a spatictac b'aj ayeq'ui, palta a yich ha' mar, anheja' k'ik'k 'inal yilji.
Icha tik tz'aj sch'olb'itan juntzanh chonhab', syak'an jantac wael t'a heb' anima.
Ha yamjinac lheb'lon, syumanb'at b'aj syal sk'ool, d'inhannhej sk'och b'aj sk'och chi'.
Ayic sk'anh k'u chi' a sch'oxani to wan scot niwac ik'nhab', inatax nok' molb'etzal nok', yojtak nok' to wanxo scot ik'nhab' chi'.
